data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_e86b93b126725dbb2dd7883174a0ee75.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Enemy heroes hit by Wanwan's attacks will have their weaknesses and positions exposed for 5s. When hitting an enemy's weakness, Wanwan deals 67(+3*Hero Level) extra <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and increases their damage taken from her subsequent attacks by 10% for 5s.
Wanwan can dash a short distance after each arrow fired from her Basic Attack. The dash speed scales with her Attack Speed.

Wanwan throws a Fire Swallow in the target direction, triggering <font color="a6aafb">Tiger Pace</font> while dealing 120<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path. The Fire Swallow then turns into 3 rotating Swallow Daggers. After a short delay, these Swallow Daggers will fly back to Wanwan one after another, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies on their way back and slowing them by 30% for 1.5s. Enemies hit twice by the Swallow Daggers will be immobilized for 0.5s.

Wanwan removes all control effects on herself and triggers <font color="a6aafb">Tiger Pace</font>. Meanwhile, she shoots Deadly Needles in all directions, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit.

Wanwan leaps into the air and fires arrows at the target enemy hero for 2.5s in rapid succession, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+35% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> per arrow. If the target is killed during this attack, Wanwan will switch to another enemy hero in her attack range, gain 30% Attack Speed, and extend the skill duration by 1s (this effect can trigger up to 3 times). Wanwan is untargetable and invincible for the duration and can trigger <font color="a6aafb">Tiger Pace</font> upon killing an enemy and at the end of the duration.
<font color="a6aafb">Crossbow of Tang</font> can only be cast on enemy heroes with all their weaknesses hit and Wanwan gains 100% Movement Speed during the duration. This damage is regarded as Basic Attack damage, and the firing rate scales with Wanwan's Attack Speed.

data.name: Wanwan

__data.skilldesc:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+0.15 Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+0.15 Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: For up to <Num2> Basic Attacks within the next <Num1>s, increase Attack Speed to <Num3> times and the Attack Speed cap to <%Num4>.####The Basic Attacks also [C2ignore] <Num5> of the target's [C5Physical Defense] and restore <Num6> HP on hit.
__data.skilldescemblem:
For up to 8 Basic Attacks within the next 5s, increase Attack Speed to 1.5 times and the Attack Speed cap to 500%.
The Basic Attacks also <font color="62f8fe">ignore</font> 8 (+1*Hero Level) of the target's <font color="ffe63c">Physical Defense</font> and restore 60<font color="fba51f">(+15% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+15% Total Magic Power)</font> HP on hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Max Attack Speed and decent late game survivability.

+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Basic Attacks slow enemies by <%Num1> and reduce their Attack Speed by <%Num2>.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s (each Basic Attack reduces it by <Num5>s, down to <Num6>s)[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
equiplist.equipskill2: Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Engulf: Basic Attacks deal 8% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).
Devour: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+8% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: S2G Esports Sigibum
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The Agile Tiger of the Oriental Fighters and a lively young girl who wields the Crossbow of Tang.

assist.desc: She's best with Supporting Tanks with powerful crowd control, like Franco and Belerick. They can help Wanwan hit more Weaknesses and unlock her Ultimate.

strong.desc: Wanwan is exceptional in dashing and powerful against heroes with short ranges or heavy weight, such as Fredrinn and Luo Yi.

weak.desc: However, due to her lack of durability and short attack range, Mages with longer ranges like Gord can poke her easily. She also lacks survival abilities when taking Burst damage and can be weak against Burst Assassins like Lancelot.
